segments.text: Ugh, what a disgusting mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing with dirty water, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is gross, spreading everywhere like a stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying dishes while everything floods? So careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, climbing up to steal cookies in this filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling in who knows what puddle extension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar; hope it's clean at least.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, probably tracking water too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, water dripping downâ€”total disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but inside it's repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a sloppy, hazardous setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
